text: Then the whole earth will be His Altar. "And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken diligently unto my commandments, which I command you this day, to love This may seem very good, but there is something deficient.
handwritten_text: Then the whole earth will be His Altar. "And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken diligently unto my commandments, which I command you this day, to love This may seem very good, but there is something deficient.
